pull.title: Bugfix: net: Apply whitelisting criteria to outgoing connections
pull.body: Whitelisting currently only works for inbound connections, but would be useful for outgoing just as well.

events.body: Concept ACK, but the [documentation for `-whitelist`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/228c319a944b0ba7c835b1909ee1c2056c652eb1/src/init.cpp#L418-L419) would need to be updated updated as well?

What is the difference with  #10051 by @rubensayshi?
Anyhow, at least @gmaxwell didn't think it was a good idea there, should probably keep the discussion in one place...

events.message: Bugfix: net: Apply whitelisting criteria to outgoing connections

events.body: Closing, this has been inactive for too long.
